My neighbour was not able to set his car in motion because it had  
snowed heavily. I helped him - he was thankful and invited me.
Don King...his actions really sadden me today...the word 'may not' have the same power to all as it once did, I still cringe when i hear it

A quarrel was followed by the decision of leaving a person close  
to me. Several days later my regret was great. I was beside  
myself. Quite unexpectedly he came and the conflict was calmly  
solved. I was glad at the possibility to be with him.

My parents thought that I didn't do my best to pass the final  
examination (secondary school). When I achieved a good grade they  
said nothing, but if I had had a bad grade they would have become  
very angry.
When I saw a big man hit another one, and nobody did anything.

On December the 28th I was filled with Joy when I was told by my  
bosses that I had been selected to attend a course at the  
Lilongwe School for Health Scienced in Lilongwe.

as I had to leave many friends and family members behind.

And getting offended or furious that a writers style isn;t to your taste is ultimately daft, I suppose.

A party with no worries (i.e. no tests homework etc.) many  
friends were present and good music.
After what just happened. In need to smoke. #burning

eleven months old. I was only told about his death without  
knowing that he had been ill.

Found out that me and my best friend are both chosen for the  
English lectures.

During a trivial (friendly) discussion, one of the participants  
made an intervention which made me feel uncomfortable.
When my family allowed me to do higher studies.

On the way back from Denmark with a friend on a small yatch,  
there was a storm and my friend was blown overboard;  I was very  
scared till I managed to get him back onboard.

I slept in a tent at the Barracks which caught fire at night and  
my best possessions got burnt in there.

I learned that a class-mate had given a list, of peolpe who help  
each other in exams, to the professor.
Left my phone in Mcds #panic

In form three we were taking our mock exams and someone else (a  
friend) was making noise when the examinateur picked on me and  
said that he would tear up my answer sheet.  I got very angry  
with the girls involved.

I was talking to a friend and he said something which was very  
funny.
When I was insulted by a fellow student.

Once sitting in the cinema, I became very anxious (watching a  
"cold" film). I do not know the reason.
Time for some despair #SDR3 #despair #fuckthisanime
Fear to come and live in Nijmegen.

Teenage neighbours smashed my letterbox for the fifth time in a  
couple of months. It was a deliberate action of kids who had  
stayed in my home, had meals there yet took a dislike to my  
daughter.
When I was acceptted as a student of psychology.

I was walking home from a place on southside and I live on  
Northside and I was followed. I headed my most direct route.

My boy-friend had promised me to come an 10 a.m. - he was 3 hours  
late.

Once my friend and I got into into a hot discussion on a very  
controversial topic.  At one point of the argument I disagreed  
with her totally and I took what she was saying as an insult.  So  
I couter-argued and unknowingly hurt her emotionally, I felt very  
sad about this.

In 1977 when my friend was caught by a crocodile.  We were  
swimming in a river on whose banks our primary school was  
situated.  When my friend was caught, he was on the banks of the  
river and some of us were still in the middle of the river.  I  
was very frightened.

When I am travelling by car and have to meet an oncoming car  
while overtaking.

When I came to know that my grandmother had died.  She was very  
close to me.
@katrinadougan_ ive went roght in the huff. Deleted the episode out of anger n everything (regret it now)

When my sister died, she was only sixteen when she was put to  
rest.

Fear came towards the end of May when the P.T.S. results were out  
after hearing the failure of my fellow three friends.

When I slept for the first time all alone in the house where I  
live now. A man phoned me at 2.00 am. He wanted something from  
me. I was afraid.
All I want to do is watch some netflix but I am stuck here in class. #depressing

A teacher at my former secondary school forced my darling to  
marry him.  The girl tried to refuse but her parents would not  
leave her alone.

My parents do not like my friend and told me not to go out with  
him.

It was at the time of my M.Sc exam, when I was not in a position  
to take the exam after having studied seriously.

I found a problem in homework which would not get solved although  
I tried my best.
After having taken an exam i feared having failed it.
When I had to come back from my village last Christmas.
love to play underlord while listening to cheery anime music

I was really hoping that I would pass the examination, but I  
failed and so I felt very sad.

When I got into a bus I found that my wallet had been stolen.  
It was not a great loss from the monetary point of view but I  
lost some documents - identity papers.  As a result I had to  
spend several days in order to get a new one.  I will always  
remember all the work I had to do and the bad treatment I  
suffered because of the bureaucratic behaviour of the civil  
servant.  I had already had bad luck and they treated me like a  
criminal.   At one point of time I really wanted to quarrel with  
them.

An encounter with a man whom I love, after a very long  
separation.
Another grim & compelling news report by @Nawalf on the blockade of aid to the starving in #Yemen #BBC #dosomethingpoliticans

Discovering that Lillehammer provided no musical environment that  
suits my taste, even though I had been told so.
things that terrify me: remembering my bf follows me on twitter
When I saw a horrible movie - Alien.

My mother and her friends were speaking badly about my father  
when they were separated, and my brothers and sisters and myself  
were allowed to listen.
Someone attacked me with a knife.
Do what makes you successful and #happy now and forever

This feeling occurred to me when my colleague entered in G.V.  
(University) and I didn't.

A shop-assistant behaved rather roughly with me though she hadn't  
the slightest grounds for it.

I overturned in a canoe a few years back and I didn't know how to  
swim. Although I had a life-jacket on I still panicked.

My parents do not like my friend and told me to stay away from  
him.
@Uber_RSA when you click over and over again for a cupcake but there are no vehicles available... #sadness

When my boyfriend came form Rumphi to Lilongwe for a visit I was  
very happy to see him and couldn't believe it was him with me.
Death in the close family.

I was in a car accident on the way back from a weekend rowing  
regatta we'd won. 5 others were in the car. I thought I'd never  
be able to row again.

When I failed the grade seven examination.

We were in a disco and the evening was not at all pleasant.   
Despite my not knowing why, I was angry with my companion.  I let

I felt this emotion when my name was announced on the radio that

The death of my father.

I feel it when I see that somebody is traying to made a stupid of

When I was 10/11 years old my father travelled very much for his  
work (he passed three months away from home).

When my boyfriend told me that it would be difficult for him to  
marry me.

When my first girlfriend an I left each other.
[ Being close to another person.]
Insulted by some stupid people.
When I knew that my husband and I were going to have a child.

I bought an aquarium which made me much pleasure. I was watching  
the fish when my father came in and asked me how much I had payed  
for it. He said he would not pay for the current that it would  
require.
@Varneyco @SheriffClarke I agree. Rioters destroy property, injure citizens, and threaten lives. We need a zero tolerance policy on riots.

A meeting with the family and the friends I felt dear and loved,  
sharing the gladness of being together at a birthday.
When my mother was proved to suffer from a very serious disease.
Staying in the room alone at night.
Insulted by other people in the shop.

After my vacations, one day after a lecture it occured to me to  
buy a rose for my mother.  We went together to a pub and my  
mother told me that she would be getting married next Spring.  I  
did not known about it and so was all the more glad.
At my sister's wedding.
A murder.

When I passed the university entrance exam.  I had thus finished  
with a difficult period of my life and I was about to begin one  
which I had desired a lot.
The death of my grandmother.
I want to pour all my tears on someone right now. So tired of this #upset #sad

@LdhranOusby @RobHarris inclined to think that 'documentary' did him more harm than good. If not I despair of people's critical faculties.
Reading a horror story alone.

I felt something close to that when I saw that there was a man on  
the terrace of the flat.
When, as a child, I was nearly knocked down by a car.

When I had been obviously unjustly treated and had no possibility  
of elucidating this.
When I was called for an Interview at Kamuzu College of Nursing.

One afternoon, helping at home on the property, I was  
(mustering) getting in cattle and a bull turned and came for me.

When I went out with my dog in a forest late at night when we  
were on a camping.
The boys rejoice as badger corner has been reclaimed for our first social of the year #cluboftheyear
When I finished the work that I had planned to do - my homework.

When I climbed up a tree to pick apples.  The angle of the ladder  
I was on did not enable me to get high enough.  This implied  
that the ladder was not very stable.

The person whom I liked most left me for a friend of mine, after  
several months of mutual help and a profound knowledge of each  
other.
A close friend died.

I felt very sad when I saw the first list from the names of the  
people who entered at the University and my name wasn't there.
I sulk too much for my own good.
Thinking about death when walking alone at night.

My girlfriend does practice and therefore leaves me alone at  
night and in the weekend. In addition, she is very busy doing  
several things. So we don't see each other often.

When I applied for a job which I thought I had a good chance of  
getting, I was not even granted an interview and did not get the  
job.

I am one of four directors of a company. We inherited land held  
by our family - ours is the 5th generation. A "democratic"  
decision was made to stap-bank an area of mangroves.

I planned to travel a distance of 20 kilometres on my bike. I  
planned this when I was working in the hospital. When I went to  
the house I found that a friend had taken my bike without my  
consent.

I and my cousin went to a filmshow at night. We went without  
making it known to my mother. While we were there at interval, I  
came across my mother just close to where we sat.
Being bored in school, not being able to marry and have children.

I felt fear once, when the car in which I travelled directed  
towards the precipice along the road.

A man was yelling outside my window at 3.00 am, yelling threats,  
though not to me.
When I pass an examination which I did not think I did well.
My parents failed to visit me as they promised.

This was when I found out that a cousin of mine had taken away my  
trousers without my consent.
Did very, very well on a Physics midterm.

When my boyfriend did not turn up in time as he promised he would  
be coming.

whenever i pout i just want Adrian to appear and tell me to stop pouting or else

my group and the graduation commission (two students of my  
classroom) because they accused us unjustly of a gossip about  
them.
so ef whichever butt wipe pulled the fire alarm in davis bc I was sound asleep #pissed #angry #upset #tired #sad #tired #hangry ######

co-passengers in order to make a queue fell on deaf ears.  I have

doing his duty.
@ChristianJMay @CityAM \nConfidence held up... despite constant and continual doom and gloom

When I was victimized for running away with a girl who was  
somebody else's wife and niece at the same time.  I was very  
angry over this issue because I was told to pay him money after  
having been punished for it.

I was angry when my sister began to talk nonsense and to laugh at  
the way I swept the room.  My anger grew (I tried to control  
myself).  After telling her to leave me alone, I vented my anger  
on her as she did not obey me.

As an evening class teacher I got positive feedback.  When the  
atmosphere is good and a kind of relaxed understanding exists.

I had a dream about my fiancTe leaving me and making an end to  
our relation.

When I was told that a boy did not want to be my friend without  
any apparent reason.

When I was about to write my Junior Certificate Exams, I received  
sad news telling me that my elder sister had passed away.
Running late  being tired and having road rage is the worst combination

I got lost in a foreign town. I did not know the language of that  
country and it took me hours to meet my friends again.

When there was a fight at home and my father threatened to throw  
a chair on my brother.

My cousin asked me to be a bridesmaid for her. This made really  
happy because I was adopted into the family and her asking me  
made me realise that she saw me as a cousin and not just another  
person. There were other cousins she could have asked but she  
asked me.

This situation happened when my friend John ate my banana which I  
kept in the cupboard.

I was very sad when I had to leave persons with whom I had a very  
intense relationship I also had to leave the environment which  
was part of this.

While I was waiting for them to give me the marks of the most  
difficult subject this year.

My life-partner, who was drinking more and more, spoke about  
kicking the cat.  He had never done anything of the kind, but I  
knew that he would do so one day, without thinking about it.
When I was admitted to the University.
Always be #cheerful, #smile often make others happy, care for others, help who feel helpless and #vulnerable. Life feels good #leadership

When I heard that I had passed Primary School Leaving Certificate  
and was selected to go for Secondary education.
I lost my purse that had money in it. I was sad until I found it.
When I was sitting in a car next to a man who was masturbating.

I had shouted at my younger brother and he was always afraid when  
I called out loudly.
Losing the will 2 live with @virginmedia business bb gone down on hold for 23 minutes & whoever picked up cut me off #fuming #NoWorkForMe

When I got a message that I was employed as a nurse at a

I was at home alone, and heard noises on the roof, and doorknobs,  
and drawers.

When, after a week at school, a teacher sent a note home saying  
that my son was inattentive and unable to do his lessons.

When I was at home alone, I felt a super-natural force, dangerous

When I dreamt that my family was in trouble and was facing many  
difficulties.

I was afraid of a certain examination although I was relatively  
well prepared.
@washingtonpost#Trump's #fear & #anger are similar to what #Hitler preached to come to power in Germany. Wake up America!!

I had been separated from my girlfriend for about a year.  On her  
birthday I put a present in her mailbox.  I had spent two days  
choosing a suitable present for her.  I waited for a few days and  
there was no reply from her; at last I received a thank-you card  
in my mailbox.  On the card there was only my name, the words thank-you   
and her signature.  I was very sad then.
My friend told me he really likes me.
My class winning against another class in a football match.

I feel afraid of the way a great friend looks at me, and also a  
little afraid of the directions that it's going.

Looking up end-of-semester results, and finding I'd failed three  
out of seven (subjects).

When a classmate hit me on my occipital region when I was busy  
studying and concentrating on my classnotes.

They wanted something to happen but I didn't.

During the last academic year i.e 1983/1984 just before the  
closure, we were surrounded and threatened by the paramilitary  
forces.
My grandmother died.
First public speaking.
When my grandmother, my second mother died.

I was walking from my friend's house, a few blocks from my house, when a  
car began to follow me. He waited I passed by it rotateed a little and  
stopped on my way. I changed completely my way and the car went  
on following me until I turned at a corner and running I hid in a  
garden of a house, waiting for the car to pass by. I went back home  
terribly afraid.

One night, my boyfriend expressed his love for me in the canteen in  
the presence of my friends by giving me a present.
@British_Airways In your Concorde Lounge in Terminal 7 JFK. So saddened to have to say, service so far is dismal. Don't expect a reply.

When I argue with my boyfriend, I feel as though he feels  
superior to me.
The first time I really fell in love with a girl.
I had a picnic with old classmates, we chatted and played games.

After having at last finished my master's thesis, I felt great  
joy and relief.  I had been haunted by the thesis during the  
whole of my studies.

Being very close to having an auto accident, almost driving off  
the road.
@ImpugnValkyrie *I frown and cup your cheeks in my hands after you step aside.* Angela I care about you. And I don't know how else I can -

I was alone in a cottage I often stay in.  I was woken up by a  
rustling sound in the middle of the night.
The death of a close relative.

When we still attended school, my brother and I usually went to  
see our aunt and to show her our term's report. She rewarded us  
with money. Although my reports were as good as my brother's, he  
got more money.

The period when I was pregnant and when I gave birth to my son.  
I can say those were the happiest months in my life.

When I was selected at TISS X.

When I had to leave my mother and my sister after a week's visit.

When my brother-in-law's brother stole my clothes when my

My father left us for another woman.
A grenade blew out next to me.

In a flat in Sydney - rough area at home on my own - the flat had

When you are far away from relatives and friends. I feel sad for

I was angry at the Cafeteria when the cook scolded and said many

When my boyfriend wouldn't dance with me on my graduation night

I felt anger when I saw that I was being misleaded by my  
boyfriend, he went out with other girls. I felt anger for his

[ A person close to me told me that his positive regard depended  
on my conduct.]

In the real sense of the word I experienced fear in my first  
months in the army. During my first night of duty. The cause for  
all this was a bear. I became panic sticken (may be for the first  
time) and even forgot that I had a gun.

Together with a little brother I biked on a lonely road in the  
Polder. Then we were annoyed by a boy on a motorbike: he  
took over, stopped, took over, etc. Then we saw he had something  
in his hand, we turned until we came across a man, who  
accompanied us.

Every time I imagine that someone I love or I could contact a  
serious illness, even death.
I am scared when I stroll alone on the Chung Chi college campus.

When in a car accident where car was total wipe off (wipe out, or  
write off).
Family member survived an operation.

My mother had for some time been trying to separate me from a  
good friend who, she thought, was not good company for me.   
Finally, at breakfast one day, we had an argument and I tried to  
defend my friend.

When on a car journey a fellow student crossed our way with his  
own car and we had to bump into a roadside trunk.

My father had been drinking and I feared him when we went to bed  
at night.
Luke 1:14\nHe will be a joy and delight to you, and many will rejoice because of his birth

We are repainting rooms in my house. My mother started to enact  
plans to paint my room without consulting me.

concerning a disconnected phone belonging to my landlord.  The

using my phone, he seemed to have no intention of having his own  
phone reconnected.

When I crashed my car and it had to be scrapped then.  It was my

My grandmother's brother had taken active part in the resistance  
movement. He had been in prison many times and there he lost his  
health. He became an invalid. When we phoned to First Aid the  
nurse on duty behaved quite unkindly when she understood how old
